content:
select role.roleid,api.appid,api.moduleid,api.apiid 
from sys_role_api api,sys_role role,sys_apps apps,sys_modules modules,sys_apis apis 
where api.roleid=role.roleid 
and api.appid=apps.appid 
and api.appid=modules.appid 
and api.moduleid=modules.moduleid 
and (modules.auflag='0' or modules.auflag='2') 
and api.appid=apis.appid 
and api.moduleid=apis.moduleid 
and api.apiid=apis.apiid 
and role.status='1' and api.status='1' and apps.status='1' and modules.status='1' and apis.status='1'
sql_desc: 预留数据。所有角色API信息

content: select sys_role.orgid,sys_role.roleid,sys_role_api.appid,sys_role_api.moduleid,sys_role_api.apiid from sys_role_api,sys_role,sys_apps,sys_modules,sys_apis where sys_role_api.roleid=sys_role.roleid and sys_role.orgid=? and sys_role_api.appid=sys_apps.appid and sys_role_api.appid=sys_modules.appid and sys_role_api.moduleid=sys_modules.moduleid and (sys_modules.auflag='0' or sys_modules.auflag='2') and sys_role_api.appid=sys_apis.appid and sys_role_api.moduleid=sys_apis.moduleid and sys_role_api.apiid=sys_apis.apiid and sys_role.status='1' and sys_role_api.status='1' and sys_apps.status='1' and sys_modules.status='1' and sys_apis.status='1'
sql_desc: 预留数据。从 DB 获取指定机构的角色信息

content:
select sys_role.orgid orgid, sys_role.roleid roleid 
from sys_user_role,sys_role 
where sys_user_role.pid=? 
and sys_user_role.roleid=sys_role.roleid 
and sys_user_role.status='1' 
and sys_role.status='1'
 union 
select sys_pl_org_application.orgid orgid,sys_user_role.roleid roleid 
from sys_user_role,sys_pl_role_release,sys_pl_application_release,sys_pl_biz_application,sys_pl_org_application 
where sys_user_role.pid=? 
and sys_user_role.roleid=sys_pl_role_release.roleid 
and sys_pl_role_release.applicationid=sys_pl_application_release.applicationid 
and sys_pl_application_release.applicationid=sys_pl_biz_application.applicationid  
and sys_pl_biz_application.applicationid=sys_pl_org_application.applicationid 
and sys_pl_biz_application.biz_status='20' 
and sys_pl_org_application.orgid=? 
and (sys_pl_org_application.expiration='00000000' or sys_pl_org_application.expiration>=?) 
and sys_user_role.status='1' 
and sys_pl_role_release.status='1' 
and sys_pl_application_release.status='1' 
and sys_pl_biz_application.status='1' 
and sys_pl_org_application.status='1' 
 union 
select sys_role.orgid orgid, sys_role.roleid roleid 
from sys_dept_role,sys_user_dept,mdm_dept,mdm_org,sys_role 
where sys_user_dept.pid=? 
and sys_dept_role.deptid=sys_user_dept.deptid 
and sys_user_dept.deptid=mdm_dept.deptid 
and mdm_dept.orgid=mdm_org.orgid 
and mdm_dept.orgid=? 
and sys_dept_role.roleid=sys_role.roleid 
and sys_dept_role.status='1' 
and sys_user_dept.status='1' 
and mdm_dept.status='1' 
and mdm_org.status='1' 
and sys_role.status='1'
 union 
select sys_pl_org_application.orgid orgid,sys_dept_role.roleid roleid 
from sys_dept_role,sys_pl_role_release,sys_pl_application_release,sys_pl_biz_application,sys_pl_org_application,sys_user_dept,mdm_dept,mdm_org 
where sys_user_dept.pid=? 
and sys_dept_role.deptid=sys_user_dept.deptid 
and sys_user_dept.deptid=mdm_dept.deptid 
and mdm_dept.orgid=mdm_org.orgid 
and mdm_dept.orgid=? 
and sys_dept_role.roleid=sys_pl_role_release.roleid 
and sys_pl_role_release.applicationid=sys_pl_application_release.applicationid 
and sys_pl_application_release.applicationid=sys_pl_biz_application.applicationid  
and sys_pl_biz_application.applicationid=sys_pl_org_application.applicationid 
and sys_pl_biz_application.biz_status='20' 
and sys_pl_org_application.orgid=? 
and (sys_pl_org_application.expiration='00000000' or sys_pl_org_application.expiration>=?) 
and sys_dept_role.status='1' 
and sys_pl_role_release.status='1' 
and sys_pl_application_release.status='1' 
and sys_pl_biz_application.status='1' 
and sys_pl_org_application.status='1' 
and mdm_dept.status='1' 
and mdm_org.status='1'
sql_desc: 预留数据。获取登录用户角色ID信息

content:
select sys_role.orgid orgid, sys_role.roleid roleid 
from sys_system_role,sys_role 
where sys_system_role.sysid=? 
and sys_system_role.roleid=sys_role.roleid 
and sys_system_role.status='1' and sys_role.status='1' 
union 
select sys_pl_org_application.orgid orgid,sys_system_role.roleid roleid 
from sys_system_role,sys_pl_role_release,sys_pl_application_release,sys_pl_biz_application,sys_pl_org_application 
where sys_system_role.sysid=? 
and sys_system_role.roleid=sys_pl_role_release.roleid 
and sys_pl_role_release.applicationid=sys_pl_application_release.applicationid 
and sys_pl_application_release.applicationid=sys_pl_biz_application.applicationid 
and sys_pl_biz_application.applicationid=sys_pl_org_application.applicationid 
and sys_pl_biz_application.biz_status='20' 
and sys_pl_org_application.orgid=? and 
(sys_pl_org_application.expiration='00000000' or sys_pl_org_application.expiration>=?) 
and sys_system_role.status='1' and sys_pl_role_release.status='1' and sys_pl_application_release.status='1' and sys_pl_biz_application.status='1' and sys_pl_org_application.status='1'

content:
select sysrole.sysid,role.orgid orgid,role.roleid roleid 
from sys_system_role sysrole,sys_role role 
where sysrole.roleid=role.roleid 
and sysrole.status='1' and role.status='1' 
union 
select sys_system_role.sysid,sys_pl_org_application.orgid orgid,sys_system_role.roleid roleid 
from sys_system_role,sys_pl_role_release,sys_pl_application_release,sys_pl_biz_application,sys_pl_org_application 
where sys_system_role.roleid=sys_pl_role_release.roleid 
and sys_pl_role_release.applicationid=sys_pl_application_release.applicationid 
and sys_pl_application_release.applicationid=sys_pl_biz_application.applicationid 
and sys_pl_biz_application.applicationid=sys_pl_org_application.applicationid 
and sys_pl_biz_application.biz_status='20' 
and sys_pl_org_application.orgid=? and 
(sys_pl_org_application.expiration='00000000' or sys_pl_org_application.expiration>=?) 
and sys_system_role.status='1' and sys_pl_role_release.status='1' and sys_pl_application_release.status='1' and sys_pl_biz_application.status='1' and sys_pl_org_application.status='1'
sql_desc: 预留数据。获取所有可用系统的角色ID

content:
select sys_role.roleid,sys_role_api.appid,sys_role_api.moduleid,sys_role_api.apiid 
from sys_role_api,sys_role,sys_apps,sys_modules,sys_apis
where sys_role.comm_flag='1' 
and sys_role_api.roleid=sys_role.roleid
and sys_role_api.appid=sys_apps.appid
and sys_role_api.appid=sys_modules.appid
and sys_role_api.moduleid=sys_modules.moduleid
and (sys_modules.auflag='0' or sys_modules.auflag='2')
and sys_role_api.appid=sys_apis.appid
and sys_role_api.moduleid=sys_apis.moduleid
and sys_role_api.apiid=sys_apis.apiid
and sys_role.status='1'
and sys_role_api.status='1'
and sys_apps.status='1'
and sys_modules.status='1'
and sys_apis.status='1'
sql_desc: 所有可用的通用角色信息

select sys_role.roleid id,sys_role.rolenm name from sys_org_comm_role,sys_role where sys_org_comm_role.orgid=? and 
sys_org_comm_role.roleid=sys_role.roleid and sys_role.comm_flag='1' and sys_org_comm_role.status='1' and sys_role.status='1'

content: select menuid,null p_menuid,1 levels,menu_icon,menunm,uri,0 sorting_order,menu_desc,orgid,roleid from sys_menu where roleid is not null and status='1' order by roleid
sql_desc: 获取平台菜单表中角色ID不为空的记录

sql_desc: 获取平台角色表中的通用角色ID

content:
select sys_role_release.roleid id, sys_role_release.rolenm name from sys_pl_org_application join sys_application_release on sys_pl_org_application.applicationid=sys_application_release.applicationid
 join sys_role_release on sys_pl_org_application.applicationid = sys_role_release.applicationid and sys_role_release.applicationid=sys_application_release.applicationid
 where sys_pl_org_application.orgid=? and sys_pl_org_application.status='1' and sys_application_release.status='1' and sys_role_release.status='1'
sql_desc: 获取机构应用所拥有的角色，关联sys_pl_org_application，sys_role_release，sys_application_release

content:
SELECT sys_menu_release.menuid,
       sys_menu_release.p_menuid,
       sys_menu_release.levels,
       sys_menu_release.menu_icon,
       sys_menu_release.menunm,
       sys_menu_release.uri,
       sys_menu_release.sorting_order,
       sys_menu_release.menu_desc,
       sys_application_release.orgid
FROM sys_pl_org_application
JOIN sys_application_release ON sys_pl_org_application.applicationid=sys_application_release.applicationid
JOIN sys_menu_release ON sys_pl_org_application.applicationid = sys_menu_release.applicationid
AND sys_menu_release.applicationid=sys_application_release.applicationid
WHERE sys_pl_org_application.orgid=?
  AND sys_pl_org_application.status='1'
  AND sys_application_release.status='1'
  AND sys_menu_release.status='1'
sql_desc: 获取机构应用所拥有的菜单，关联sys_pl_org_application，sys_role_release，sys_application_release

content:
select role.roleid,api.appid,api.moduleid,api.apiid 
from sys_pl_role_release role,sys_pl_application_release app, sys_pl_role_api_release api,sys_pl_biz_application biz 
where role.applicationid=app.applicationid and role.roleid=api.roleid 
and biz.applicationid=app.applicationid 
and biz.biz_status='20' 
and role.status='1' and app.status='1' and api.status='1' and biz.status='1'
sql_desc: 系统预留。获取各机构已发布上线的应用的角色 API 信息

content:
select sys.sysid,api.roleid,api.appid,api.moduleid,api.apiid 
from sys_system_role sysrole,sys_role role,sys_role_api api,sys_system sys,sys_apps apps,sys_modules modules,sys_apis apis 
where sysrole.roleid=role.roleid and role.roleid=api.roleid and sysrole.sysid=sys.sysid and sys.orgid=? 
and api.appid=apps.appid 
and api.appid=modules.appid 
and api.moduleid=modules.moduleid 
and (modules.auflag='0' or modules.auflag='2') 
and api.appid=apis.appid 
and api.moduleid=apis.moduleid 
and api.apiid=apis.apiid 
and sysrole.status='1' and role.status='1' and api.status='1' and sys.status='1' 
and apps.status='1' and modules.status='1' and apis.status='1'
sql_desc: 系统预留。获取系统角色信息

content:
select app.orgid,api.appid,api.moduleid,api.apiid 
from sys_pl_application_release app, sys_pl_pub_api_release api,sys_pl_biz_application biz 
where api.applicationid=app.applicationid 
and biz.applicationid=app.applicationid 
and biz.biz_status='20' 
and app.status='1' and api.status='1' and biz.status='1'

from sys_pl_application_release app, sys_pl_pub_api_release api 
where app.orgid=? and api.applicationid=app.applicationid and app.applicationid=? 
and app.status='1' and api.status='1'

from sys_pl_role_release role,sys_pl_application_release app, sys_pl_role_api_release api 
where app.orgid=? and role.applicationid=app.applicationid and app.applicationid=? and role.roleid=api.roleid 
and role.status='1' and app.status='1' and api.status='1'

content:
select sys_role.orgid orgid, sys_role.roleid roleid 
from sys_user_role,sys_role where sys_user_role.pid=? and sys_user_role.roleid=sys_role.roleid and sys_user_role.status='1' and sys_role.status='1' 
union 
select sys_pl_org_application.orgid orgid,sys_user_role.roleid roleid from 
sys_user_role,sys_pl_role_release,sys_pl_application_release,sys_pl_biz_application,sys_pl_org_application where sys_user_role.pid=? and sys_user_role.roleid=sys_pl_role_release.roleid and sys_pl_role_release.applicationid=sys_pl_application_release.applicationid and sys_pl_application_release.applicationid=sys_pl_biz_application.applicationid and sys_pl_biz_application.applicationid=sys_pl_org_application.applicationid and sys_pl_biz_application.biz_status='20' and sys_pl_org_application.orgid=? and (sys_pl_org_application.expiration='00000000' or sys_pl_org_application.expiration>=?) and sys_user_role.status='1' and sys_pl_role_release.status='1' and sys_pl_application_release.status='1' and sys_pl_biz_application.status='1' and sys_pl_org_application.status='1' 
union 
select sys_role.orgid orgid, sys_role.roleid roleid from sys_role_ug,sys_ug,sys_ug_user,sys_role where sys_ug_user.pid=? and sys_ug_user.ugid=sys_ug.ugid and sys_ug.ugid=sys_role_ug.ugid and sys_role_ug.roleid=sys_role.roleid and sys_role_ug.status='1' and sys_ug.status='1' and sys_ug_user.status='1' and sys_role.status='1' 
union 
select sys_pl_org_application.orgid orgid,sys_role_ug.roleid roleid from sys_role_ug,sys_pl_role_release,sys_pl_application_release,sys_pl_biz_application,sys_pl_org_application,sys_ug,sys_ug_user where sys_ug_user.pid=? and sys_ug_user.ugid=sys_ug.ugid and sys_ug.ugid=sys_role_ug.ugid and sys_role_ug.roleid=sys_pl_role_release.roleid and sys_pl_role_release.applicationid=sys_pl_application_release.applicationid and sys_pl_application_release.applicationid=sys_pl_biz_application.applicationid and sys_pl_biz_application.applicationid=sys_pl_org_application.applicationid and sys_pl_biz_application.biz_status='20' and sys_pl_org_application.orgid=? and (sys_pl_org_application.expiration='00000000' or sys_pl_org_application.expiration>=?) and sys_role_ug.status='1' and sys_pl_role_release.status='1' and sys_pl_application_release.status='1' and sys_pl_biz_application.status='1' and sys_pl_org_application.status='1' and sys_ug.status='1' and sys_ug_user.status='1'
sql_desc: 系统预留

content:
select rc.scope,role.roleid 
from sys_role_client rc,sys_role role 
where rc.client_id=? and rc.roleid=role.roleid and rc.status='1' and role.status='1' 
union 
select sys_role_client.scope,sys_role_client.roleid roleid 
from sys_role_client,sys_pl_role_release,sys_pl_application_release,sys_pl_biz_application,sys_pl_org_application 
where sys_role_client.client_id=? and sys_role_client.roleid=sys_pl_role_release.roleid 
and sys_pl_role_release.applicationid=sys_pl_application_release.applicationid 
and sys_pl_application_release.applicationid=sys_pl_biz_application.applicationid 
and sys_pl_biz_application.applicationid=sys_pl_org_application.applicationid 
and sys_pl_biz_application.biz_status='20' 
and sys_pl_org_application.orgid=? 
and (sys_pl_org_application.expiration='00000000' or sys_pl_org_application.expiration>=?) 
and sys_role_client.status='1' 
and sys_pl_role_release.status='1' 
and sys_pl_application_release.status='1' 
and sys_pl_biz_application.status='1' 
and sys_pl_org_application.status='1'
sql_desc: 系统预留。

content: select appid,moduleid,apiid,content from ( select sys_apis.appid,sys_apis.moduleid,sys_apis.apiid,sys_api_content.content,sys_api_content.stability  from sys_apps,sys_modules,sys_apis,sys_api_content  where sys_apps.appid = sys_apis.appid and sys_modules.appid = sys_apis.appid and sys_modules.moduleid = sys_apis.moduleid and  sys_apps.status = '1' and sys_modules.status = '1' and sys_apis.status = '1' and  sys_apps.appflag = '0' and (sys_modules.auflag = '0' or sys_modules.auflag = '2') and sys_apis.contentid = sys_api_content.contentid  and (sys_api_content.stability='50' or sys_api_content.stability='60')  union select sys_apis.appid,sys_apis.moduleid,sys_apis.apiid,sys_api_his_content.content,sys_api_his_content.stability  from sys_apps,sys_modules,sys_apis, (select max(his.updatedt) updatedt,sys_apis.appid,sys_apis.moduleid,sys_apis.apiid from sys_apps,sys_modules,sys_apis,sys_api_his_content his  where sys_apps.appid = sys_apis.appid and sys_modules.appid = sys_apis.appid and sys_modules.moduleid = sys_apis.moduleid and  sys_apps.status = '1' and sys_modules.status = '1' and sys_apis.status = '1' and  sys_apps.appflag = '0' and (sys_modules.auflag = '0' or sys_modules.auflag = '2') and sys_apis.contentid = his.contentid  and (his.stability='50' or his.stability='60') group by sys_apis.appid,sys_apis.moduleid,sys_apis.apiid ) max_his,sys_api_his_content left join  (select sys_api_content.contentid from sys_apps,sys_modules,sys_apis,sys_api_content  where sys_apps.appid = sys_apis.appid and sys_modules.appid = sys_apis.appid and sys_modules.moduleid = sys_apis.moduleid and  sys_apps.status = '1' and sys_modules.status = '1' and sys_apis.status = '1' and  sys_apps.appflag = '0' and (sys_modules.auflag = '0' or sys_modules.auflag = '2') and sys_apis.contentid = sys_api_content.contentid  and (sys_api_content.stability='50' or sys_api_content.stability='60') ) sys_api_content on sys_api_his_content.contentid=sys_api_content.contentid where sys_apps.appid = sys_apis.appid and sys_modules.appid = sys_apis.appid and sys_modules.moduleid = sys_apis.moduleid and  sys_apps.status = '1' and sys_modules.status = '1' and sys_apis.status = '1' and  sys_apps.appflag = '0' and (sys_modules.auflag = '0' or sys_modules.auflag = '2') and sys_apis.contentid=sys_api_his_content.contentid   and (sys_api_his_content.stability='50' or sys_api_his_content.stability='60') and sys_api_his_content.updatedt=max_his.updatedt and sys_api_content.contentid is null ) recent_record where recent_record.stability='50'
sql_desc: 预留数据。缓存API KPI，IDE 使用API 除外

content:
select sys_apis.appid,sys_apis.moduleid,sys_apis.apiid,sys_api_content.content 
from sys_apps,sys_modules,sys_apis,sys_api_content 
where sys_apps.appid = sys_apis.appid and sys_modules.appid = sys_apis.appid and sys_modules.moduleid = sys_apis.moduleid and 
sys_apps.status = '1' and sys_modules.status = '1' and sys_apis.status = '1' and 
sys_apps.appflag = '0' and (sys_modules.auflag = '0' or sys_modules.auflag = '2') and sys_apis.contentid = sys_api_content.contentid 
and sys_apps.appid='ZYAPP_IDE' and sys_api_content.stability='50'
union
select sys_apis.appid,sys_apis.moduleid,sys_apis.apiid,sys_api_his_content.content 
from sys_apps,sys_modules,sys_apis,
(select max(his.hisid) hisid,sys_apis.appid,sys_apis.moduleid,sys_apis.apiid
from sys_apps,sys_modules,sys_apis,sys_api_his_content his 
where sys_apps.appid = sys_apis.appid and sys_modules.appid = sys_apis.appid and sys_modules.moduleid = sys_apis.moduleid and 
sys_apps.status = '1' and sys_modules.status = '1' and sys_apis.status = '1' and 
sys_apps.appflag = '0' and (sys_modules.auflag = '0' or sys_modules.auflag = '2') and sys_apis.contentid = his.contentid 
and sys_apps.appid='ZYAPP_IDE' and his.stability='50' group by sys_apis.appid,sys_apis.moduleid,sys_apis.apiid
) max_his,sys_api_his_content left join 
(select sys_api_content.contentid
from sys_apps,sys_modules,sys_apis,sys_api_content 
where sys_apps.appid = sys_apis.appid and sys_modules.appid = sys_apis.appid and sys_modules.moduleid = sys_apis.moduleid and 
sys_apps.status = '1' and sys_modules.status = '1' and sys_apis.status = '1' and 
sys_apps.appflag = '0' and (sys_modules.auflag = '0' or sys_modules.auflag = '2') and sys_apis.contentid = sys_api_content.contentid 
and sys_apps.appid='ZYAPP_IDE' and sys_api_content.stability='50'
) sys_api_content on sys_api_his_content.contentid=sys_api_content.contentid
where sys_apps.appid = sys_apis.appid and sys_modules.appid = sys_apis.appid and sys_modules.moduleid = sys_apis.moduleid and 
sys_apps.status = '1' and sys_modules.status = '1' and sys_apis.status = '1' and 
sys_apps.appflag = '0' and (sys_modules.auflag = '0' or sys_modules.auflag = '2') and sys_apis.contentid =sys_api_his_content.contentid  
and sys_apps.appid='ZYAPP_IDE' and sys_api_his_content.stability='50' 
and sys_api_his_content.hisid=max_his.hisid
and sys_api_content.contentid is null
sql_desc: 预留数据。缓存 IDE 使用API

content: select sys_api_content.content from sys_apps,sys_modules,sys_apis,sys_api_content  where sys_apps.appid = sys_apis.appid and sys_modules.appid = sys_apis.appid and sys_modules.moduleid = sys_apis.moduleid and  sys_apps.status = '1' and sys_modules.status = '1' and sys_apis.status = '1' and  sys_apps.appflag = '0' and (sys_modules.auflag = '0' or sys_modules.auflag = '2') and sys_apis.contentid = sys_api_content.contentid and sys_apis.appid=? and sys_apis.moduleid=? and sys_apis.apiid=?
sql_desc: 从 DB 获取 API 代码内容

content:
SELECT apis.appid, apis.moduleid, apis.apiid,content.content
	FROM sys_apps apps, sys_modules modules, sys_apis apis, sys_api_content content 
	WHERE apps.appid = apis.appid
		AND modules.appid = apis.appid
		AND modules.moduleid = apis.moduleid
		AND apps.status = '1'
		AND modules.status = '1'
		AND apis.status = '1'
		AND (modules.auflag = '0' OR modules.auflag = '2')
		AND apis.contentid = content.contentid
		AND content.stability = '50'
union
SELECT apis.appid, apis.moduleid, apis.apiid,his_api.content
FROM sys_apps apps, sys_modules modules, sys_apis apis, (SELECT his.stability, his.contentid,his.content
	 FROM sys_api_his_content his, (
        SELECT MAX(max_his.updatedt) AS updatedt
	    FROM sys_api_his_content max_his
		WHERE (max_his.stability = '50' OR max_his.stability = '60')
	    GROUP BY max_his.contentid
        ) max_his_api
        WHERE his.updatedt=max_his_api.updatedt
        AND NOT EXISTS (
						SELECT * FROM sys_api_content a WHERE (a.stability = '50' OR a.stability = '60') AND a.contentid=his.contentid
						) 
) his_api
WHERE his_api.stability='50'
AND apps.appid = apis.appid
AND modules.appid = apis.appid
AND modules.moduleid = apis.moduleid
AND (modules.auflag = '0' OR modules.auflag = '2')
AND apps.status = '1'
AND modules.status = '1'
AND apis.status = '1'
AND apis.contentid = his_api.contentid
sql_desc: 缓存api使用

content:
SELECT all_api.content content
FROM (
SELECT apis.appid appid, apis.moduleid moduleid, apis.apiid apiid,content.content content 
 	FROM sys_apps apps, sys_modules modules, sys_apis apis, sys_api_content content 
 	WHERE apps.appid = apis.appid
 		AND modules.appid = apis.appid
 		AND modules.moduleid = apis.moduleid
 		AND apps.status = '1'
 		AND modules.status = '1'
 		AND apis.status = '1'
 		AND (modules.auflag = '0' OR modules.auflag = '2')
 		AND apis.contentid = content.contentid
 		AND content.stability = '50'
 union
 SELECT apis.appid appid, apis.moduleid moduleid, apis.apiid apiid,his_api.content content 
 FROM sys_apps apps, sys_modules modules, sys_apis apis, (SELECT his.stability, his.contentid,his.content
 	 FROM sys_api_his_content his, (
         SELECT MAX(max_his.updatedt) AS updatedt
 	    FROM sys_api_his_content max_his
 		WHERE (max_his.stability = '50' OR max_his.stability = '60')
 	    GROUP BY max_his.contentid
         ) max_his_api
         WHERE his.updatedt=max_his_api.updatedt
         AND NOT EXISTS (
 						SELECT * FROM sys_api_content a WHERE (a.stability = '50' OR a.stability = '60') AND a.contentid=his.contentid
 						) 
 ) his_api
 WHERE his_api.stability='50'
 AND apps.appid = apis.appid
 AND modules.appid = apis.appid
 AND modules.moduleid = apis.moduleid
 AND (modules.auflag = '0' OR modules.auflag = '2')
 AND apps.status = '1'
 AND modules.status = '1'
 AND apis.status = '1'
 AND apis.contentid = his_api.contentid
 ) all_api WHERE all_api.appid=? AND all_api.moduleid=? AND all_api.apiid=?
sql_desc: 预留数据。从DB获取已上线的API

content: select orgid id, case when de0810011 is null then de0810013j else de0810011 end name, case when de0810011 is null then de0810013j else de0810011 end text, status, updatedt from mdm_org order by name
